Uses of Interface
org.apache.datasketches.memory.WritableBuffer

  • Uses of WritableBuffer in org.apache.datasketches.memory

    Methods in org.apache.datasketches.memory that return WritableBuffer
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default WritableBuffer
    WritableMemory.asWritableBuffer()
    Returns a new WritableBuffer with a writable view of this object.
    WritableBuffer
    WritableMemory.asWritableBuffer(ByteOrder byteOrder)
    Returns a new WritableBuffer with a writable view of this object with the given byte order.
    WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableDuplicate()
    Returns a duplicate writable view of this Buffer with the same but independent values of start, position and end.
    WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableDuplicate(ByteOrder byteOrder)
    Returns a duplicate writable view of this Buffer with the same but independent values of start, position and end, but with the specified byteOrder.
    default WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableRegion()
    A writable region is a writable view of this object.
    WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableRegion(long offsetBytes, long capacityBytes, ByteOrder byteOrder)
    A writable region is a writable view of this object.
    static WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableWrap(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
    Provides a view of the given ByteBuffer for write operations.
    static WritableBuffer
    WritableBuffer.writableWrap(ByteBuffer byteBuffer, ByteOrder byteOrder, MemoryRequestServer memReqSvr)
    Provides a view of the given ByteBuffer for write operations.
